For Physical Persons

The Law Firm offers for physical persons the following legal services:

Running of trials, including in particular following areas/ fields of law:

  • - civil law (cases related to payment of dues, tort law, damage compensation)
  • - family law (divorces, alimony / spousal and child maintenance, separation, the origin of a child, cases related to parental authority, cases related to property rights, division of joint property - fixing of non-equal shares in a joint property, dissolution of co-ownership)
  • - labour law (representation of an employee as a plaintiff/ petitioner or as a defendant/ respondent in the court of law and other limbs of the law)
  • - inheritance law (proceedings of inheritors)

Preparing drafts of civil contracts, labor contracts and other contracts

Preparing drafts of lawsuits and other legal documents to courts and other limbs of law and public organizations

Preparing conclusions on legal issues, or legal information in these legal matters

General counseling in casual legal cases (oral or written legal advising )
